  CartoonStrip

public class CartoonStrip
extends java.lang.Object

Program to create simple animated cartoon strips using the CartoonCharacter class.

CartoonStrip

public CartoonStrip()
Constructor: set up user interface

??????

dance

public void dance(CartoonCharacter face)
Makes a character do a little dance. Has one parameter - a CartoonCharacter object

doAnimate

public void doAnimate()
doAnimate creates two cartoon characters on the window. Then animates them according to a fixed script by calling a series of methods on the characters.

doThreeDancers

public void doThreeDancers()
doThreeDancers creates three cartoon characters on the window. Then makes each character do the same little dance in turn, by calling the dance method.
